title: Item synergy with Evelyn?
body: So I was wondering, that because Evelyn's e applies on hit affects like ravenous hydra (or lich bane if ap) and is treated as a basic attack, what kind of items really synergise with her kit (like black cleaver) when going sustained damage assassin?
